attributes.action: enforce that ALL monkeys wear underwear in public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This of course includes ALL monkeys/apes in ALL zoos/safari parks. Indecent exposure from these animals is at a shocking level and action needs to be taken NOW to enforce that basic underwear should be a requirement for these animals. This act would make zoos more family-friendly and cover any offensive areas and vulgarity to members of the public.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
